attributes.action: Outlaw the foriegn funding and supply of materials to religious organisations within the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By outlawing the foreign funding (as it is for political Parties)for religous organisations of all faiths would help in reducing the radicalism of moderate faith followers within the UK.
It is a known fact that certain States have thier own take on faith and twisted religous texts for thier own benefit and now promote these views through providing financial and other material support in the UK
